questions.question: The Incremental loss (ITL) is given by -------------- (where L- loss, C â€“ cost, i- no.of generating unit)

explanations.a: Incremental loss is considered to be the diffrential of cost function with respect to generating unit.
explanations.b: The incremental loss has the units of Rs/MWh.
explanations.c: The incremental loss has the units of Rs/MWh.
explanations.d: The incremental loss has the units of Rs/MWh.
Penalty factor does not have any units.

questions.question: A power system has two generating plants and the power is being dispatched economically withP1=150 MW and P2=275 MW. The loss coefficients are B11=0.001, B12=-0.0001 and B22=0.0013. Find the penalty factor of plant 1?

explanations.b: Refer the formulae for the penalty factor and check your calculations.
explanations.c: Refer the formulae for the penalty factor and check your calculations.
explanations.d: Refer the formulae for the penalty factor and check your calculations.

questions.question: is called the co-ordination equation because

answers.b: It co-ordinates ITL with penalty factor.
answers.c: It co-ordinates real-power generation with reactive-power generation.
answers.d: It co-ordinates bus voltage magnitude with IC

explanations.a: Co-ordination equation deals with ITL and IC.
explanations.b: Co-ordination equation does not deal with penalty factor.
explanations.c: Co-ordination equation does not deal with real-power and reactive power generation.
explanations.d: Co-ordination equation does not deal with voltage magnitude.
